project.name: Edwin Mauricio Olivera Portfolio
project.description: Professional portfolio and design education platform

setup_instructions.1_clone_or_download: Download or clone the project files to your local machine
setup_instructions.2_install_dependencies: Run 'npm install' in the project root directory
setup_instructions.3_environment_setup: Create a .env file in the root directory (see environment_variables section below)
setup_instructions.4_database_setup: Optional: Set up PostgreSQL database or use in-memory storage for development
setup_instructions.5_start_development: Run 'npm run dev' to start the development server

scripts.dev: Start development server with hot reload

optional_for_development.DATABASE_URL: Leave empty to use in-memory storage for development

ports.description: The application runs on port 5000 by default. Frontend and backend are served from the same port.

key_features.responsive_design: Mobile-first responsive design with dark/light theme
key_features.portfolio_showcase: Interactive project gallery with detailed case studies
key_features.wysiwyg_editing: In-context editing capability for content management
key_features.theme_system: Dark/light mode with local storage persistence

development_workflow.hot_reload: Vite provides hot module replacement for instant updates
development_workflow.type_safety: Full TypeScript support across frontend and backend
development_workflow.component_library: Pre-built shadcn/ui components for consistent design

production_deployment.build_process: Frontend builds to dist/public, backend bundles to dist/index.js
production_deployment.database_required: PostgreSQL database connection required for production

troubleshooting.port_conflicts: If port 5000 is in use, the application will attempt to use the next available port
troubleshooting.database_connection: For development, you can run without a database - it will use in-memory storage
troubleshooting.asset_loading: Make sure attached_assets directory is present with all project images
troubleshooting.build_issues: Run 'npm install' to ensure all dependencies are installed

local_development_checklist: ✓ Check responsive design on different screen sizes

sample_env_file.content:
# Optional for development - remove if using in-memory storage
# DATABASE_URL=postgresql://username:password@localhost:5432/portfolio

# Environment
NODE_ENV=development
